text: There was an issue recently with table data not updating when saved, but it was resolved (something about indexes of columns being off) - perhaps this is related
Anyone having issues with all of the row data being deleted/swiped if a new column is added to a HubDB table?
<@UAGCTGD3J> this is exactly what I was talking about - same issue -- <@U6GNQ7JBU> helped me last time with this
<@U4RP6AGV9> I just checked and its still happening for me... you said it was resolved for you?
It was, I'm not sure if the fix he put out applied to my specific situation, but it WAS resolved last time I checked
But basically I would add a column and almost everything would get cleared
then I'd add new info and try updating and nothing would stick
I am experiencing a similar problem. Were you able to solve this? When I try and add a new column to a table, all of my data in my existing rows gets deleted.
Hmm... hoping I can get help asap! Need to add a column for additional information to a table with a number of rows already built and live on a landing page. I'm stuck... :disappointed:
